User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.2; en-US; rv:1.7.12) Gecko/20050915 Firefox/1.0.7 (ax)
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.2; en-US; rv:1.7.12) Gecko/20050915 Firefox/1.0.7 (ax)

When in your Gmail inbox, the page renders to the width of the screen, disregarding the fact that it should be x - (width of GoogleDS). This does not happen with any other website. This only happens when Google Desktop Search sidebar is showing. It happens regardless of whether it's on the left or right side of the screen.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Run the Google Desktop Search application, and set the sidebar to the right hand side of the screen
2. In firefox, navigate to gmail, login and view your mail.
3. You'll see your gmail is being rendered to the same dimensions as your screen, without being resized by firefox.
